cu.explanation_en: Setting Num_Threads_PUSCH to a negative value will cause thread allocation failure and prevent the CU from starting properly.

du.explanation_en: Setting global_log_level to an invalid enum value will cause logging configuration error and potential startup issues.
du.explanation_zh: 將 global_log_level 設定為無效的枚舉值會導致日誌配置錯誤，並可能造成啟動問題。
